descripcion: Vivero Virtual is the XR Incubator Program of the Universidad de los Andes that was a beneficiary of the Higher Ed XR Innovation Grant from Unity Social Impact and Meta Immersive Learning, thanks to its proposals for inclusion, impact, viability and innovation in literacy from the academic perspective of this new use of technologies, to increase access to AR/VR hardware, high-quality educational content and other resources that will help educators create or improve innovative XR programs.

IMAGINE is a Visual Computing research group at Los Andes University in the Systems & Computing Engineering department. The group develops research and innovation with knowledge-based image processing, computer graphics, mixed reality, human machine interaction and interactive robotics. Our main application domains are: biomedicine, training and entertainment, visual analytics and sustainable urban systems.

The Oasis Student Initiative seeks to foster knowledge and exploration of different Mixed Reality technologies among participants. Our main objective is to provide a weekly meeting space in which various categories of Mixed Reality applications are presented and learning, interaction and fun around these technologies are promoted.

SinfonIA is a robotics and AI research group at Universidad de Los Andes, about merging technology and human interaction. They currently work in the following subgroups: Perception, Navigation, Manipulation and Speech, each of which refines a piece of the social interaction pie. Likewise, members in Interface and Toolkit ensure that our robots are top-notch, while task members orchestrate the grand symphony of robotic tasks.
Colivri Team is a group of professors and students from the Universidad de los Andes that seeks to develop research and development projects in the area of Virtual Reality and Augmented Reality.
